column1: ha se le ka ntho eno feela
taba ke hore ache uabona dintho tsena tsechakelang diakhopisa
chee ha baetse feela le mokubetso ona oo rekubetsang
tsebo jwale untseuetsang motho wa modimo
nkauphoqa hampe ha ukabawalahla sepele sena saka hape
hoba le mabaleng mona anyamela mamao
ure na neuoe yena otlatswa kliniking neng
tsebo ska seba hle manyeo skana
nkhono matlou ha utsebe oile moreneng
